SHEET ?              ?                                       ?                                       ?

  |                      <  m |        |  |                      <>   |        |  |                      <>   |        |
  | (dbin) --> ab* --> alu    | irop   |  | au --> db --> aob,au      | trim   |  | au --> aob                | trix   |
  | (rya) --> * --> aob,at    |--------|  | (dbin) --> ab --> ath     |--------|  | (dbin) --> dbe --> au     |--------|
  | -1 --> alu                | db     |  | edb --> dbin              | db     |  | adb --> dbin,irc          | db     |
  |                           |--------|  | +2 --> au                 |--------|  | (rya) --> ab --> au       |--------|
? |                           | 1n     |  |                           | x      |  |                           | x      |

                    v                                       v                                       v
   ____________________________________    ____________________________________    ____________________________________ 
  |                      >  m |        |  |                      <>   |        |  |                      <  m |        |
  | edb --> dbin              | fruk   |  | (ath) --> dbh --> au      | trix   |  | au --> ab --> aob,at      | iruk   |
  | (rxd) --> ab* --> dcr     |--------|  | au --> aob,pc             |--------|  | (dbin) --> abd --> alu    |--------|
  |                           | a3     |  | (dbin) --> db1 --> atl,au | db     |  | (pc) --> db --> au        | db     |
  |                           |--------|  | edb --> dbin,irc          |--------|  | -1 --> alu                |--------|

##########################################################################################################################
Appendix H - Page 10(94) - FIG. 13J
##########################################################################################################################
SHEET A              6                                       7                                       8
   ____________________________________    ____________________________________    ____________________________________ 
  |                           |        |  |                      <    |        |  |                      <> m |        |
  | alu --> ab* --> alu       | np     |  | alu --> *e --> au         | irin   |  | au --> pc                 | twop   |
  | 0 --> alu                 |--------|  | au --> aob,pc             |--------|  | (dbin) --> ab* --> alu,dob|--------|
  |                           | db     |  | (rxa) --> * --> au        | bc     |  | (rxa) --> db --> aob,au   | dbi    |
  |                           |--------|  |                           |--------|  | -1 --> alu                |--------|
M |                           | 5n     |  |                           | x      |  | +1,+2 --> au              | 1i     |
  |                           |--------|  |                           |--------|  |                           |--------|
  |                           | rxuk   |  |                           |        |  |                           | rxuk   |
  |___________________________|________|  |___________________________|________|  |___________________________|________|
  |      389  |   mmxw0    |   mmxw0   |  |      111  |   mmxw1    |   mmxw1   |  |      38c  |   mmiw1    |   mmrw1   |
  \------------------------------------/  \------------------------------------/  \------------------------------------/
                      |                             |                                                |
                      |                             |                                                v
                      v                             |                              ____________________________________ 
                   mmxw1                            |---> mmxw3  if irc[11]=1     |                      <>   |        |
                                                    |                             | au --> ab --> rxa         | trix   |
                                                    |                             | edb --> dbin,irc          |--------|
                                                    |---> mmxw2  if irc[11]=0     | (ir) --> ird              | a1     |
                                                                                  | (pc) --> db --> aob,au    |--------|
N                                                                                 | +2 --> au                 | x      |

                                                                                  |                           |        |
                                                                                  |___________________________|________|

                                                                                  \------------------------------------/

  \------------------------------------/                                          \------------------------------------/
                    |                                                                               |
                    v                                                                               v
   ____________________________________    ____________________________________    ____________________________________ 
  |                      <  m |        |  |                      <    |        |  |                      <>   |        |
  | au --> * --> aob,rya      | irop   |  | au --> db --> aob,au,pc   | irix   |  | (ath) --> dbh --> au      | trin   |
  | (dbin) --> ab* --> alu    |--------|  | (ry) --> ab --> alu,at    |--------|  | au --> aob,pc             |--------|
  | -1 --> alu                | db     |  | -1 --> alu                | dbi    |  | (dbin) --> dbl --> au     | db     |
  |                           |--------|  | +2 --> au                 |--------|  | edb --> irc               |--------|
J |                           | 1n     |  |                           | 1i     |  | (ryl) --> ab --> alu,atl  | 1i     |

  |                           |        |  |                           | rxuk   |  | 0 --> au                  |        |

                    v                                       v                                       v
   ____________________________________    ____________________________________    ____________________________________

  | adb --> dbin              | frop   |  | (at) --> db --> rx        | frix   |  | au --> db --> aob,au      | twop   |
  | (rxa) --> db --> au       |--------|  | edb --> dbin,irc          |--------|  | (ryh) --> ab -->[alu,alub,|--------|
  | -1,-2 --> au              | db     |  | (ir) --> ird              | a1     |  | -1 --> alu      [dob      | db     |

  | (rxdl) --> dbd --> alue   |--------|  | (dbin) --> ab -->[alu,alub|--------|

                  dvum2                   |                           |        |
                                          | (alub) --> alu            | np     |
                                          | (rxh) --> db --> alu      |--------|
                                          |                           | bc     |
                                          |                           |--------|

                                          |                           |--------|
                                          |                           |        |
                                          |___________________________|________|
                                          |      21e  |   dvum2    |   dvum2   |
                                          \------------------------------------/
                                                  |
                                                  |
                                                  |                                ____________________________________ 
                                                  |--->  dvum3  if /x             |                         * |        |
                                                  |                               | ftu --> db --> au         | np     |
                                                  |--->  trap0  if x              | (rxh) --> ab --> alu,atl  |--------|
                                                                                  | -1 --> alu                | bc     |
                                                                                  | +1 --> au                 |--------|

  |                      <    |        |  |                      <    |        |  |                      <    |        |
  | au --> aob,pc             | irix   |  | au --> aob,pc             | irix   |  | au --> aob,pc             | irix   |
  | (dbin) --> abe --> alu,at |--------|  | (dbin) --> abe --> alu,at |--------|  | (rxl) --> db --> alu      |--------|
  | (rxl) --> db --> alu      | dbi    |  | (rxl) --> db --> alu      | dbi    |  | (ryl) --> abe --> alu,at  | dbi    |
  |                           |--------|  |                           |--------|  |                           |--------|

##########################################################################################################################
SHEET E              3                                       4                                       5
   ____________________________________    ____________________________________    ____________________________________ 
  |                           |        |  |                           |        |  |                      <>   |        |
  | (pc) --> ab --> alu,at    | np     |  | au --> ab --> alu,at      | np     |  | edb --> irc               | trin   |
  | (rxa) --> db --> au       |--------|  | (rxa) --> db --> au       |--------|  | (rya) --> db --> aob,au   |--------|
  | -1 --> alu                | db     |  | -1 --> alu                | db     |  | +2 --> au                 | db     |
  | -4 --> au                 |--------|  | -4 --> au                 |--------|  |                           |--------|
E |                           | 1n     |  |                           | 1n     |  |                           | x      |

O







   ____________________________________    ____________________________________ 
  |                      <    |        |  |                      <>   |        |
  | (ath) --> db --> ryh      | irix   |  | (ath) --> dbh --> aob,au  | trix   |
  | au --> aob,pc             |--------|  | au --> ab --> rx          |--------|
  | (rx) --> ab --> dcr       | dbi    |  | (dbin) --> dbl --> aob,au | db     |
  |                           |--------|  | edb --> irc               |--------|
